title: Rotten Apples
description: From the author of "Festering Lilies" published to critical acclaim When a beautiful art historian dies in her house in Chelsea, one theory blames the Revenue for driving her to suicide, and part-time civil servant Willow King is sent in to investigate the tax inspectors. While she is working on her report, Willow narrowly escapes being burned to death. Not all the tax inspectors are so lucky, and Willow's assignment turns into a murder hunt. As she battles with the dramas of her private life and the dangers at work, Willow confronts some very unpleasant realities.
author: Natasha Cooper
